mapper.select: SELECT a.id, b.title, b.content, b.`status`, b.amount, b.unit_logo, b.unit_name, b.create_at FROM t_collection AS a LEFT JOIN t_billboard AS b ON a.pid = b.id WHERE a.collection_type = #{collectionType} AND a.user_id = #{createBy} ORDER BY a.create_at DESC

SELECT a.id, b.`name`, b.remark, b.guide_picture AS guidePicture, b.unit_name AS unitName FROM t_collection AS a LEFT JOIN t_harvest AS b ON a.pid = b.id WHERE a.collection_type = #{collectionType} AND a.user_id = #{createBy} ORDER BY a.create_at DESC

SELECT a.id, b.title, b.origin FROM t_collection AS a LEFT JOIN t_news AS b ON a.pid = b.id WHERE b.news_policy = 2 AND collection_type = #{collectionType} AND a.user_id = #{createBy} ORDER BY a.create_at DESC
